########################################################################
# Setup dependencies
########################################################################

find_package(FFTW3f REQUIRED)

########################################################################
# Setup library
########################################################################
include(GrPlatform) #define LIB_SUFFIX

include_directories(${Boost_INCLUDE_DIR})
link_directories(${Boost_LIBRARY_DIRS})

list(APPEND moveii_sources
    burst_sync_cc_impl.cc
    rrc_filter_fft_impl.cc
)

set(moveii_sources "${moveii_sources}" PARENT_SCOPE)
if(NOT moveii_sources)
	MESSAGE(STATUS "No C++ sources... skipping lib/")
	return()
endif(NOT moveii_sources)

add_library(gnuradio-moveii SHARED ${moveii_sources})
target_link_libraries(gnuradio-moveii ${Boost_LIBRARIES} ${GNURADIO_ALL_LIBRARIES} ${FFTW3F_LIBRARIES})
set_target_properties(gnuradio-moveii PROPERTIES DEFINE_SYMBOL "gnuradio_moveii_EXPORTS")

if(APPLE)
    set_target_properties(gnuradio-moveii PROPERTIES
        INSTALL_NAME_DIR "${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib"
    )
endif(APPLE)

########################################################################
# Install built library files
########################################################################
include(GrMiscUtils)
GR_LIBRARY_FOO(gnuradio-moveii RUNTIME_COMPONENT "moveii_runtime" DEVEL_COMPONENT "moveii_devel")

########################################################################
# Build and register unit test
########################################################################
include(GrTest)

include_directories(${CPPUNIT_INCLUDE_DIRS})

list(APPEND test_moveii_sources
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/test_moveii.cc
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_moveii.cc
)

add_executable(test-moveii ${test_moveii_sources})

target_link_libraries(
  test-moveii
  ${GNURADIO_RUNTIME_LIBRARIES}
  ${Boost_LIBRARIES}
  ${CPPUNIT_LIBRARIES}
  gnuradio-moveii
)

GR_ADD_TEST(test_moveii test-moveii)

########################################################################
# Print summary
########################################################################
message(STATUS "Using install prefix: ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}")
message(STATUS "Building for version: ${VERSION} / ${LIBVER}")
